:::The Destrocons/Falcon/Snare:::

Ramjet: Good. We are in complete agreement.  Now, the first order of business 
is to fix up this base, and make it suitable to live and work in.
::Falcon transforms::
Falcon: Thats alright, you get used to it.
Ramjet: Destrons!  Cygnar and i have agreed.  I will be leading us until 
Magmatron reutrns.  My first order to all of you, including myself, is to fix 
up this base.
::All of my Destrons start working on the base.  While they are working, 
Snare takes the dead bodies and moves them to the side.  he has a plan::

--part1_a2.11285938.27da2726_boundary
